oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Selenium Supplementation of Beef Heifers: Comparison of a Sustained-Release Selenium Bolus to an 120 PPM Selenium Salt-Mineral Mixture
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Swecker, William S.
Blodgett, Dennis K.
Eversole, Dan E.
Thatcher, Craig D.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: selenium bolus
sustained-release
blood Se concentration
beef heifers
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The objective of the study was to compare the effect of a sustained-release selenium (Se) bolus to an 120 ppm Se salt-mineral mixture on blood Se concentrations in yearling beef heifers.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1991; 169
